summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.1°C), outside temperature (down 9.8°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 376 m) and light levels (up 8369 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 12732 lux), and cloud levels (up 261 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, dry and less humid conditions and light winds will prevail. Drizzle or light rain possible, fog or low cloud is expected, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Similar weather conditions should remain.
